title: ennai kaDaittETruvAi
sahitya:
ennai kaDaittETuvAi cennimalai vITravanE


anupallavi

  annai pOl aDiyArai anbODu aNaiyum nI enmEl iniyEnum Ivirakkam pirandu


caraNam    unnUru tuNai peTru uyyalAm enru nAn panmurai bhaktiyODu unnaip-paNinda pOdum
innumE iduvaraiyil enpAl unnuLLam eLLaLavEnum karuNai koLLAdirukkalAmO
